qualitative.reasoning: Maruti Suzuki is a subsidiary of Suzuki Motor Corporation (Japan) and is India's largest passenger vehicle manufacturer. It is known for strong corporate governance, a debt-free balance sheet, and consistent dividend payouts. The company has maintained market leadership (~40% share) despite intense competition. Recent financial performance shows robust recovery with high sales and profit growth (3-year CAGRs of 20% and 54% respectively) and healthy return ratios (ROCE ~22%).
